cause.description:
The crisis in darfur is huge now, with about 400,000 people killed, and many more wounded or displaced! we need to do something about this!
1. the crisis going on in darfur is a genocide and it must be stoppped
2. we need to call on the un to increse the sanctions put on sudan
3. we need to do something about this!
cause.mission: help end the crisis in darfur
cause.name: help save darfur!
